member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_STREAM_BEHAVIOR_HINT
member.summary: Provides information about the input streams passed into the method.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_STREAM_BEHAVIOR_HINT.Enable
member.summary: A value indicating whether this input stream should be used to compute behavior hints. Set to true if the stream should be used to compute behavior hints; otherwise, set to false.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_STREAM_BEHAVIOR_HINT.Width
member.summary: The width of the input stream.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_STREAM_BEHAVIOR_HINT.Height
member.summary: The height of the input stream.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_PROCESSOR_STREAM_BEHAVIOR_HINT.Format
member.summary: The format of the input stream.
